mapper.insert: INSERT INTO teach_record( student_id, coach_id, teach_subject, teach_time, teach_field, shuttle, shuttle_time, shuttle_place, tips) VALUES( #{student_id}, #{coach_id}, #{teach_subject}, #{teach_time}, #{teach_field}, #{shuttle}, #{shuttle_time}, #{shuttle_place}, #{tips})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teach_record WHERE student_id=#{student_id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM teach_record WHERE coach_id=#{coach_id}
SELECT COUNT(evaluation) FROM teach_record WHERE student_id=#{student_id}
SELECT COUNT(evaluation) FROM teach_record WHERE student_id=#{student_id} AND evaltype=#{evaltype}
SELECT * FROM teach_record WHERE student_id=#{0} AND teach_state='3' AND evaluation!='' ORDER BY evaltime DESC LIMIT #{1},#{2}
SELECT COUNT(evaluation) FROM teach_record WHERE coach_id=#{coach_id} AND teach_state='3'
SELECT COUNT(evaluation) FROM teach_record WHERE coach_id=#{coach_id} AND evaltype=#{evaltype}
SELECT * FROM teach_record WHERE coach_id=#{coach_id} AND evaluation!='' ORDER BY evaltime DESC LIMIT #{offset},#{pageSize}
mapper.update: UPDATE teach_record SET teach_state='1' WHERE teach_id=#{teach_id}
UPDATE teach_record SET teach_state='-1' WHERE teach_id=#{teach_id}
UPDATE teach_record SET teach_state='-2' WHERE teach_id=#{teach_id}
mapper.select: SELECT AVG(evalstar) FROM teach_record WHERE coach_id=#{coach_id}
